children.value: 27. Write a C program ind sum of minor diagonal elements of a matrix.

Input elements in the matrix :
element - [0],[0] : 1
element - [0],[1] : 2
element - [0],[2] : 3
element - [1],[0] : 4
element - [1],[1] : 5
element - [1],[2] : 7
element - [2],[0] : 8
element - [2],[1] : 9
element - [2],[2] : 10

The matrix is :

1       2       3
4       5       7
8       9       10
 Minor diagonal elements are:  3 5 8
sum of minor diagonal element:16
